attributes.action: Punish the deed not the breed!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the law means that any dog fitting a certain set of characteristics is of a type that constitutes it is a dangerous dog. This means many dogs of two mixed non banned breeds are seized and put to death just because of what they look like without them actually ever hurting or showing any intention of hurting anyone or anything...if this was done with people it would be rightly so called rascism!
We believe that a dog should only be taken away if it poses a threat and not because of what it looks like... even though it is a much loved family pet

punish the DEED not the BREED
